question: Which of the following depicts Aswamedha?
option1: It refers to unquestioned control over an area in which the royal horse ran uninterrupted
option3: It was a royal consecration which conferred supreme power on the king
answer: It refers to unquestioned control over an area in which the royal horse ran uninterrupted
explanation: Aswamedha refers to unquestioned control over an area in which the royal horse was allowed to run uninterrupted. It depicted the power and strength of the kings of the later vedic times.
